name: Bet on Bronson
description:
In this short little game you follow around Bronson, a child actor and star in the series "Bet on Bronson". With the help of actors dressed as monsters and various puzzles being introduces each episode for Bronson to solve, the tv show tries to be a format that both very young children and their adult parents can enjoy.

Bronson can move around with the arrow keys, interact with nearby objects by pressing the spacebar and quit the game via the escape key.
